pros: Flexible with your student schedule

review_title: Nice Co-workers, lousy out of touch Management
pros: The co-workers and the ";little people" on the campus are mostly nice.  Holiday party and summer picnic.  Campus is beautiful place.
cons: A lot of the Directors and upper management are ruthless, heartless and expect way too much from employees.  They do not know how to communicate to their support staff.  They only worry about how to impress upper management by being fake.

review_title: Custodial Department - Out with the old, in with the New!!
pros: The employees in the department were very nice. They all gave advice to assist you in getting hired.  The college has wonderful benefits only if you can make it past your probationary period which the director will let you go whenever she feels like it.
cons: The director has poor communication standards.  She has no sympathy in letting someone go, no matter how hard they work.  If you don't follow her MISGUIDED direction she will let you go almost immediately, with no hesitation.  Even if you were just trying to be a team player, which they preach about when you get hired.  It's like this...  what she says goes and what she says can sometimes be the only guess you have in your head. good luck!

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Doylestown Boro Post Office, PA
pros: Nothing i s good about working here anymore
cons: Low pay, terrible vibe on campus, faculty and some staff are downright mean and morale is terrible throughout. They want to work you to death and never show appreciation. Everyone is too busy being cut throat. This was a good place to work up until about 8 years ago.
